Text:
Thanks again CZ.

When you upload the torrent is there any set times? I'm forever logging in to see when the next updates are. If I can get an idea as to when to expect it I'll log in then.

Thanks again for this great community service that you provide.

Hi there dear 'fan_of_myself' xD!!!

I wish I could tell you exactly when I have the time to upload...some days I work until late, other days I get home early, then many days I have to help my children with their homework, and so on... So I can only say, it's always more likely to find new episodes from me from 4-9 PM (GMT) than earlier, but some days I'm so exhausted I post them later, as many of you have noticed.

Anyway, thanks for being there!!!
No CZ, thank YOU for being there. It's got me how you find time to do all of this. I made ONE torrent available once and it took me about an hour just to sort it all out...
